description.para: Obtain reference points to CSignal object class smart pointer.

return.para: Return reference points to CSignal object class smart pointer. This return value is the reference of CSignalRef type.

remarks.para: In user defined CAR files, if and only if using signal attribute, then the user can invoke MyCSignalPart function directly in cpp files. User can invoke method in CSignalPart class through return value of MyCSignalPart function.

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos 2.0 or later.
